mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from saleboard order by saleboard_seq desc) tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into saleboard ( sale_status, sale_subject, sale_price, sale_nego_YN, sale_category, sale_content, member_id, sale_logtime, sale_hide, sale_image1, sale_image2, sale_image3, sale_image4, sale_image5, member_profilePic, location1_addr2, sale_free_YN, sale_ad_YN, member_reputation, sale_seq) values( #{sale_status}, #{sale_subject}, #{sale_price}, #{sale_nego_YN}, #{sale_category}, #{sale_content}, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{sale_hide}, #{sale_image1}, #{sale_image2}, #{sale_image3}, #{sale_image4}, #{sale_image5}, #{member_profilePic}, #{location1_addr2}, #{sale_free_YN}, #{sale_ad_YN}, #{member_reputation}, seq_sale.nextval )
